titles.title: Wonderful birth, to a manger He came

properties.verseOrder: v1 c1 v2 c1 v3 c1 v4 c1

verse.name: v1
verse.lines: Wonderful birth, to a manger He came, made in the likeness of man, to proclaim God’s boundless love for a world sick with sin, pleading with sinners to let Him come in.

verse.name: c1
verse.lines: Wonderful name He bears, wonderful crown He wears, wonderful blessings His triumphs afford; wonderful Calvary, wonderful grace for me, wonderful love of my wonderful Lord!

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: Wonderful life, full of service so free, friend to the poor and the needy was He; unfailing goodness on all He bestowed, undying faith in the vilest He showed.

verse.name: v3
verse.lines: Wonderful death, for it meant not defeat, Calvary made His great mission complete, wrought our redemption, and when He arose, banished for ever the last of our foes.

verse.name: v4
verse.lines: Wonderful hope, He is coming again, coming as King o’er the nations to reign; glorious promise, His word cannot fail, His righteous kingdom at last must prevail!
